text: Where to send the queries related to portal and approval related issues for the approval process 2021 22?
category: Institute are requested to raises queries only through online Grievance Redressal mechanism available on AICTE website under Approval Process 2021-22 quick links. No queries through email will be entertained.

text: How can I know if my college is AICTE approved?
category: The candidates can check the name of the college from the list of AICTE approved college.

text: What is the full form of AICTE?
category: AICTE stands for All India Council of Technical Education.

text: How can we take admission in AICTE approved colleges?
category: he admission process will depend on the college and course. Some may provide admission based on merit while others on the entrance exam.

text: How to delete old faculty details?
category: Faculty record cannot be deleted. Faculty can be marked as Duplicate or Left the Institute in Faculty Details tab.
